alert.note: Alert for Lower Yukon Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 27 at 5:45AM AKDT until March 27 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow and freezing rain. Additional snow accumulation of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Lower Yukon Valley. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Roads could be very slippery. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of freezing rain and snow will occur this morning, then change over to mainly snow this afternoon. Snow will taper off this afternoon.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
